lines.text: Now clear up them there shambles, or I'll feed you piecemeal to the rats in the cellar.
Ar, fortune rides the shoulders of them what schemes.
Until your dying day I will be grateful.
I regret to inform you, *this* is your dying day!
Sometimes them what quotes the Bible has less Bible in their hearts than them what don't.
I pledge on the soul of my madre to catch you, Silver, and when I do the death you face will make men's blood run cold for a hundred years.
